t: Amazon.com : Bradley Smoker 6-Rack Outdoor Electric Smoker, Digital Vertical Smoker With Stainless Steel Grill : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: I contacted Bradley (on Monday after the holiday) and they were nice enough to offer to send a new element. Waited 2 weeks and it never showed. Called back and was told the heat element was on back order so was offered a new digital box with heat element attached. I'm thinking this is great! They sent one promptly but get this... it was used (scratched, burned and bent)!!! Let me say again, purchased this smoker BRAND ...

t: Amazon.com: Bradley Original Smoker : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: Purchase a Bradly Smoker , work ... email to Bradley and a fast response , tell me to check its power cord among other things. Looked at the heating element , wires leading to heat element where gone , Cheep wires weir between 18 or 20 gauge wire , removed back cover to smoker and found the wires were substandard, replaced wire with 600 volt Silicon wire. It now works Great , but original wires not up to any code in the USA maybe China ...
